page.title: 19Over Sixties Club,A. Moor
page.content: The group was formed in 1961 and began holding meetings in The Topp in 1977. There are{43 members}and about 34 of them attend meetings, which are held fortnightly on Wednesdays from 2.30 p.m. to 4 p.m. At the meetings they play card games and skittles, guests show film slides or demonstrate how to make things. Sometimes they have parties, or go on outings or out for a meal in an hotel. They have a committee and some ladies make cakes, tea and biscuits and the men put out the tables and chairs. In the Over Sixties there is{a lady who is 100 {years old.} The group tries to keep in touch with people who might be lonly and help sort out any problems the members might have.
